channel.title: B2B client & server not working
channel.description: Can anyone help me get my client and server working? I have done all th steps required to run a server, so when i try to run server it doesnt work. I only get "Error connecting to server" when i try logging in, any reason why???? I am using the Back to Basics source.

item.title: B2B client & server not working
item.dc:creator: @Jays Jays
item.description:
@Jays wrote:

Only thing i found were:

if(super.aFrame_Sub1_15 != null) return new URL("http://jays-scape.freehostia.com:" + (43594 + anInt958)); }

AND

        aClass24_1168 = new Class24(this, -978, method19(43594 + anInt958));</blockquote>

I just changed those as you can see… the ports. The IP’s are 127.0.0.1 though, i checked in the client.java for my server and client. I didnt have an eGUI.java file.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 26, 2009, 10:37:53 am[/size][hr]Can you just tell me a good source with client and server to download??
